channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Directory Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Directory Server

item.title: CVE-2010-2222|2024-08-07T02:25:07.182Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20directory%20server
item.description: The _ger_parse_control function in Red Hat Directory Server 8 and the 389 Directory Server allows attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted search query.
